progetto.view.gui

Class PlayerBoardPaneController

  • java.lang.Object
    • progetto.view.gui.AbstractController
      • progetto.view.gui.PlayerBoardPaneController

  • public class PlayerBoardPaneController
extends AbstractController
    this is the class that handles the player board fxml. This class is only instanced by javafx, this mean that must have a default constructor.
    Author:
    Federicai

        public static javafx.scene.layout.Pane getPlayerBoard(int numberOfPlayerBoard,
                                                      GUIView view)
        Parameters:
        numberOfPlayerBoard - number of the player board required
        view - the current gui view
        Returns:
        a pane containing the player board required

      • setUp

        public void setUp(GUIView view,
                  int numberOfPlayerBoard)
        set up this object, it is equivalent to a constructor since there is no access to it

        numberOfPlayerBoard - the number of the player board associated to this controller

      • onMouseClicked

        private void onMouseClicked(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent event,
                            int y,
                            int x)
        called when the user clicks on a dice among the placed ones if possible send a ToolCardSetPlacedDiceAction or a ToolCardSetSecondPlacedDiceAction to the controller
        Parameters:
        event - click on the dice
        y - y position of the dice clicked
        x - x position of the dice clicked
